short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks Goku From Opening A New Tab. It Does Not Collect Any Data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks Goku website from showing ads and opening new tabs randomly. It will automatically detect if a new tab is opened by goku website and close it immediately. It does not collect user data and does track any user information. Once added it will start working automatically. It is very small in size and does not impact any browser performance.
